response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $14,000. This price not only reflects the product's true worth but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I trust this offer will be mutually beneficial and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
